channel.title: apache on My personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in apache on My personal blog

item.title: get the most visited url from an access log through a single line of bash
item.description: If you have an apache access log and want to see the visit count of your site, you can use this one-liner to get some basic visit stats. grep "200 " /var/log/apache2/apimeister-access.log \ | grep -v 'Googlebot' \ | grep -v 'Baiduspider' \ | grep -v 'bingbot' \ | grep -v 'YandexBot' \ | grep -v 'MJ12bot' \ | grep -v 'meanpathbot' \ | grep -v 'DotBot' \ | grep -v 'AhrefsBot' \ | cut -d '"' -f 2 \ | cut -d ' ' -f 2 \ | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | less
